ComicInfo.Title: The Reality Wraith; At Last, Long Love!!; Captain Canaduck!; Figure of Mystery; Planet of the Ducks; A Bird in the Hand
ComicInfo.Summary:
The classic humor anthology comic continues with early work from Michael T. Gilbert, Dave Sim and Gene Day.
Editorial: Friedrich, Gilbert (1 page text)
The Wraith: The Reality Wraith: Gilbert (16 pages)
Tales of the Oregon Bobcat: At Last, Long Love!: Bucher (6 pages)
The Beavers: Sim (11 pages)
Planet of the Ducks: Macklin (10 pages)
A Bird In The Hand!: Day (4 pages)
...And Now For Something Completely Different...: Leialoha (1 page)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-16 10:14:51. [CVDB17800]
ComicInfo.Writer: Michael T. Gilbert, Dotty Bucher, Dave Sim, Ken Macklin, Gene Day, Dorthy Bucher, Mike Friedrich, Steve Leialoha
ComicInfo.Penciller: Michael T. Gilbert, Dotty Bucher, Dave Sim, Ken Macklin, Gene Day, Dave Sim, Dorthy Bucher, Gene Day, Ken Macklin, Michael T. Gilbert, Steve Leialoha
ComicInfo.Inker: Michael T. Gilbert, Dotty Bucher, Dave Sim, Ken Macklin, Gene Day, Dave Sim, Dorthy Bucher, Gene Day, Ken Macklin, Michael T. Gilbert, Steve Leialoha
ComicInfo.Letterer: Michael T. Gilbert, Dotty Bucher, Dave Sim, Ken Macklin
